Texts.Chs: 把^orange;3份虫芽花种子^reset;带给黄色的翼族人。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring ^orange;3 Beetlesprout Seeds^reset; to the yellow Avian at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我的^orange;基因提取器^reset;出故障了，我需要3份^orange;虫芽花种子^reset;，不然就是这个月白给！你能帮我解决这个麻烦吗？
Texts.Eng: My ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset; is on the fritz! and I need 3 ^orange;Beetle Sprout^reset; seeds for a client or I don't eat this month! Can you help me out?

Texts.Chs: 非常感谢你。虽然礼轻，但请拿上我扫描^green;古代科技指南^reset;得到的数据。也许你能用上。
Texts.Eng: Thanks so much. It's not much, but take this data I uncovered by scanning ^orange;Technology of the Ancients^reset;. Maybe you can make use of it.
